data.text: @bbdumont @MCash94 @Crimealytics @skooks She’s a left wing political hack
@MCash94 @ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks To clarify, other doctors who know her would disagree.

@bbdumont @ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks Brett, it is despicable to speak so casually about another’s professional competence, especially as innuendo when you know nothing of her as a person or physician. I’ve been in the ER at 3am with her. This whole discussion is gross and sad.

@MCash94 @ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks Like I said. People I know who know her would disagree. That’s not my opinion. My opinion would be that she a mini Fauci political hack who couldn’t cut it in private medicine.
@bbdumont @ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks Shame on you, Brett. You have no goddamned idea what you’re talking about.
@MCash94 @ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks She loves the limelight. Hard left winger - all politics with her - and a terrible reputation amongst coworkers. Facts.
@Crimealytics @skooks So totally makes sense to still have a vax mandate in New Orleans. Idiot mayor - wow - just all politics.
@MCash94 @ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks I don’t know about terrific physician. Not the description I’ve gotten from people who know her.
@MCash94 @Crimealytics @skooks She has lied throughout the pandemic about the data in an effort to provide the mayor with top cover on city restrictions. She’s a political shill and a disgrace.

@ItIsAlwaysN0w @Crimealytics @skooks Despicable.  Dr. Avegno is a gem of a person and a terrific physician having to do an impossible job while bearing abuse no one should have to endure.  I can't imagine there's a person in New Orleans more ready for this all to be over.
